data.name: Yadurani López
data.profile: Front-end Developer and knowledge of UX, I have knowledge of Layout and Web protocols HTML, pure CSS, Javascript, Stylus, LESS, SASS, Styled Components and libraries, frameworks such as: Bootstrap, Reactjs, Next.js, Gatsby.js - CMS: Wordpress. Creative, innovative that seeks to generate the best experiences for its clients and users through agile proposals that optimize its processes, time and resources.

experience.jobDescription: Layout and Development of web applications in next.js and react.js
Application that connects housewives with people who like to eat homemade, developed in react.js
Designer and Front-end Developer of applications in the legal sector at vue.js

Design of proposals for websites, website development, creation of 100% responsive sites from scratch, handling of HTML5, CSS3, WORDPRESS and PRESTASHOP. Adaptation of the design to the website. Use of frameworks such as bootstrap, foundation and materialize.css for the construction of sites.

Design, layout and development of functional and non-functional web proposals, experience in html5 and css3 programming through the construction of responsive pages from scratch. UI, UX design for mobile application interfaces and web applications.
